001/** SmallAsteroid.java - A class to represent a small asteroid
002* This class meets project specification requirement a. by inheriting from BigAsteroid
003* @author Daniel Andrews
004* @version Final Project
005*/
006public class SmallAsteroid extends BigAsteroid {
007        /** Full constructor sets coordinates, speed, and loads images
008        * @param x x coordinate
009        * @param y y coordinate
010        */
011        public SmallAsteroid(double x, double y) {
012                super(); // Call to super for direction and image rotation
013                xSet(x); // Set coordinates and speed
014                ySet(y);
015                setSpeed(3.0);
016                setImage(Asteroids.gc.getSmallAsteroidImage()); // Retrieve image sprit from controller
017                setRotatedImage(getImage());
018        }
019
020        /** Return if object is enabled
021        * @return true if object is enabled 
022        */
023        public boolean isEnabled() {
024                return true;
025        }
026        
027        /** Destroys object
028        */
029        public void destroy() {
030                Asteroids.gc.removeAsteroid(this); // Remove this object from game controller
031        }
032
033        /** Returns the radius of collision mask
034        * @return Radius of collision mask
035        */
036        public double getMaskRadius() {
037                return (double) getImage().getWidth() / 2 + 5; // Adjusted to work better in gameplay
038        }
039}
